EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: Webinar Today “Privacy in the Age of ADS-B”
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Date: Wednesday, February 12, 2020 – 8 pm EST
ADS-B is here, ushering in a new world of safety and airborne services for pilots. However, this new technology brings with it a host of privacy concerns because it allows anonymous people to track and monitor your flying.
Join SocialFlight President, Jeff Simon, an A&P/IA mechanic and builder, along with Roger Dykmann, BendixKing Director of Offering Management and Market Strategy, explore how ADS-B works, where the data goes, who has access to your information and what you can do to protect yourself and your privacy.
Topics include:
- ADS-B Overview - Data You are Sharing with Every Flight - Where Your Data Goes - Who Can Access Your Flight Data - Ways to Protect Your Privacy - ADS-B Solutions
